original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī sa saṭṭhā viharati gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī saṁsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī sa saṭṭhā viharissati gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī sa saṭṭhā viharati gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharissati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī sa saṭṭhā viharissati gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā—
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī sa saṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapati puttena vā sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evam assa vacanīyā

original: ‘māyye, saṁsaṭṭhā vihari gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi. Viviccāyye; vivekaññeva bhaginiyā saṅgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
analyzed: māyye gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api vivicca āyye vivekaññā iva bhaginiyā saṅghaḥ vaṇṇeti iti

original: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: evam ca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tathā iva paggaṇheyya sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyam samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ; no ce paṭinissajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: tam paṭinissajjeyya icca etam kusala no ce paṭinissajjeyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
analyzed: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā
vivekaññā iva bhaginiyā saṅghaḥ vaṇṇeti iti
sā bhikkhunī saṅgha majjham pi ākaḍḍhitvā vattabbā
vivekaññā iva bhaginiyā saṅghaḥ vaṇṇeti iti

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā bhikkhunī sa saṭṭhā viharati gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhunim samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṁsaṭṭhā viharati gahapatināpi gahapatiputtenapi.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā bhikkhunī sa saṭṭhā viharati gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api

original: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhunim samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya sā tuṇhassa
dutiyam pi etam attham vadāmi pe
tatiyam pi etam attham vadāmi pe

original: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya;
analyzed: samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā na paṭinissajjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā na paṭinissajjati āpatti pācittiyassa
adhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
